body_html:
I notices something strange in your log:

Successfully installed [...] tensorflow-1.3.0 tensorflow-gpu-1.3.0 [...]

Can you clear this out and reinstall only one TensorFlow (-gpu)?

@yifeif we're not depending on tensorflow in tensorflow-gpu, are we?

Is this in a virtualenv? Can you try that?

body:
I notices something strange in your log:

```
Successfully installed [...] tensorflow-1.3.0 tensorflow-gpu-1.3.0 [...]
```

Can you clear this out and reinstall only one TensorFlow (-gpu)? 

@yifeif we're not depending on tensorflow in tensorflow-gpu, are we?

Is this in a virtualenv? Can you try that?
